Uses of Interface
xxl.core.spatial.points.Point

  • Packages that use Point 
    Package Description
    xxl.core.indexStructures
    Provides important index structures like B-trees, R-trees, M-trees and bulk-loading-algorithms.
    xxl.core.spatial
    Support data types and building-blocks for spatial, temporal and mining algorithms (e.g. similarity joins)
    xxl.core.spatial.cursors
    Provides mappers for different type of Point and Rectangle objects as well as several join algorithms: nested loops distance similarity-join for Points, the spatial join algorithm based on space-filling curves proposed by Jack Orenstein, similarity-join algorithm "GESS: Generic External Space Sweep" and hash-based plane sweep for two-dimensional data.
    xxl.core.spatial.points
    Implemetns the base type Point for all data that deals with points of arbitrary dimensions and wrappers for double[], float[] and fixed-mantissa points.
    xxl.core.spatial.predicates
    Useful spatial predicates such as Contains, Overlap, Within (Euclidean distance), etc .
    xxl.core.spatial.rectangles
    Implemetns the base type Rectangle for high-dimensional rectangle objects (hyper-cubes) and extentions for different coordinate types (double, float, long).

    • Uses of Point in xxl.core.spatial

      Methods in xxl.core.spatial with parameters of type Point 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double LpMetric.distance(Point o1, Point o2)
      Returns the L_p distance of the given objects.

    • Uses of Point in xxl.core.spatial.cursors

      Methods in xxl.core.spatial.cursors that return types with arguments of type Point 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Function<Point,DoublePointRectangle> Mappers.pointToDoublePointRectangleMappingFunction(double epsilon)
      Returns a function converting a FloatPoint to a FloatPointRectangle where the point is the center of the rectangle 2*epsilon x 2*epsilon x ... x 2*epsilon.
      static Function<Point,FixedPointRectangle> Mappers.pointToFixedPointRectangleMappingFunction(double epsilon)
      Returns a function converting a Point to a FixedPointRectangle where the point is the center of the rectangle 2*epsilon x 2*epsilon x ... x 2*epsilon.
      static Function<Point,FloatPointRectangle> Mappers.pointToFloatPointRectangleMappingFunction(float epsilon)
      Returns a function converting a FloatPoint to a FloatPointRectangle where the point is the center of the rectangle 2*epsilon x 2*epsilon x ... x 2*epsilon.
      static Function<Point,KPEzCode> Mappers.pointToKPEzCodeMappingFunction(float epsilon, int maxLevel)
      Returns a Mapper mapping incoming FloatPoints to an Iterator of KPEzCodes containing a rectangle (of type Rectangle) as well as the corresponding z-code (of type BitSet).
      Methods in xxl.core.spatial.cursors with parameters of type Point 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void UniverseFloat.UniverseFunction.debugOut(Rectangle mbr, Point point)
      prints debug information
      protected void UniverseDouble.UniverseFunction.debugOut(Rectangle mbr, Point point)
      prints debug information
      protected void RectangleUniverseDouble.UniverseFunction.debugOut(Rectangle mbr, Point point)
      prints debug information
      Method parameters in xxl.core.spatial.cursors with type arguments of type Point 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Cursor<DoublePoint> Mappers.mapPointToDoublePoint(Iterator<? extends Point> iterator)
      Returns a Mapper mapping an Iterator of FloatPoints to an Iterator of DoublePoints.
      static Cursor<DoublePointRectangle> Mappers.mapPointToDoublePointRectangle(Iterator<? extends Point> iterator, float epsilon)
      Returns a Mapper mapping a FloatPoint to a FloatPointRectangle where the point is the center of the rectangle 2*epsilon x 2*epsilon x ... x 2*epsilon.
      static Cursor<FixedPointRectangle> Mappers.mapPointToFixedPointRectangle(Iterator<? extends Point> iterator, double epsilon)
      Returns a Mapper mapping a Point to a FixedPointRectangle where the point is the center of the rectangle 2*epsilon x 2*epsilon x ... x 2*epsilon.
      static Cursor<FloatPoint> Mappers.mapPointToFloatPoint(Iterator<? extends Point> iterator)
      Returns a Mapper mapping an Iterator of DoublePoints to an Iterator of FloatPoints.
      static Cursor<FloatPointRectangle> Mappers.mapPointToFloatPointRectangle(Iterator<? extends Point> iterator, float epsilon)
      Returns a Mapper mapping a FloatPoint to a FloatPointRectangle where the point is the center of the rectangle 2*epsilon x 2*epsilon x ... x 2*epsilon.
      static Cursor<KPEzCode> Mappers.mapPointToKPEzCode(Iterator<? extends Point> iterator, float epsilon, int maxLevel)
      Returns a Mapper mapping incoming FloatPoints to an Iterator of KPEzCodes containing a rectangle (of type Rectangle) as well as the corresponding z-code (of type BitSet).
      static Cursor<FloatPoint> Mappers.mapPointToUnitCube(Iterator<? extends Point> iterator, Rectangle universe)
      Returns a Mapper transforming a given Iterator of FloatPoints to the unit-cube [0;1)^dim assuming that all Points are inside the given universe-FloatPointRectangle and that the Points are of type FloatPoint.

    • Uses of Point in xxl.core.spatial.points

      Classes in xxl.core.spatial.points that implement Point 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractPoint
      An "implementation" of the Point interface.
      class  DoublePoint
      A Wrapper for double[]-points that provides useful methods on points like e.g. a conversion mechanism.
      class  FixedPoint
      A Wrapper for Fixed-Mantissa-Points.
      class  FloatPoint
      A Wrapper for float[]-points that provides useful methods on points.
      class  NumberPoint<T extends Number>
      A Wrapper for Number[]-points that provides useful methods on points like e.g. a conversion mechanism.
      Methods in xxl.core.spatial.points with parameters of type Point 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double AbstractPoint.distanceTo(Point point)
      Computes the distance from this Point to any given point using the euclidean metric.
      static double Points.lpDistance(Point p1, Point p2, int p)
      Computes the L_p-distance of two Points.
      static double Points.lpDistanceWithoutRoot(Point p1, Point p2, int p)
      Computes the L_p-distance of two Points WITHOUT performing the final 1/p power-operation.
      static double Points.maxDistance(Point p1, Point p2)
      Computes the maximum-distance (=L_\infty-metric) between two given Points.
      static boolean Points.withinMaximumDistance(Point p1, Point p2, double distance)
      Checks whether the the maximum-distance (=L_\infty-metric) of two Points is less equal than the given distance.

    • Uses of Point in xxl.core.spatial.predicates

      Classes in xxl.core.spatial.predicates with type parameters of type Point 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DistanceWithinMaximum<P extends Point>
      A distance predicate based on the euclidean distance-measure (This distance-measure corresponds to the L_infinity-metric).
